about_the_game:
You wake up in a dark, cold room. Sturdy bars cover the windows, through which you can glimpse the silhouettes of dead trees bathed in cold moonlight. The dampness and age hang heavily in the air, and faint sounds heighten a sense of unease. Your head is splitting, your thoughts are chaotic, and your memories are shrouded in a thick fog. Gathering your willpower, you take your first steps into the darkness…

This is how someone's twisted dream begins, how a macabre feast commences, how a path strewn with pain and death unfolds, where each step might be your last.

On this path, only you decide who will be your ally and who your enemy. Lie, manipulate, make deals, fight or surrender, kill or die — the choice is yours. Will you have the strength to reach the end? And how will this feast of bones conclude?

Game Features:

  • Atmospheric Psychological Horror Roguelike. The game combines elements of a visual novel and a quest, offering a dynamic, immersive story with visually striking scenes. Enjoy a storyline that comes alive before your eyes.

  • Freedom to Explore. Move wherever you want, discover new locations, and immerse yourself in the environment. You’re not just an observer but an active participant in this story.

  • Choice in Problem Solving. Complete tasks in whatever way you see fit. The skill upgrade system allows you to tailor gameplay mechanics to suit your style. Don’t want to waste time looking for keys? Grow stronger to break down doors, or find another way in.

  • Deep Social Interaction System. Develop your social skills and choose your own approach to interacting with other characters. Use diplomacy and kindness if that’s your style, or achieve your goals through intimidation and strength. Want to manipulate others with lies? It’s all up to you.

  • Exploration of Locations. Search for important items that will unlock new possibilities or protect you when you need it most.

  • Puzzle Solving. Solve puzzles to obtain unique items or save the most valuable thing you have — your life. Sometimes, a riddle’s solution is the only way to survive.

  • Unpredictability. Be prepared for unexpected events that can completely change the rules of the game. Other people, traps, and puzzles are far from the greatest threats. There is something much more terrifying lurking in the darkness of this world…

The Beginning of a Great Story. This is only the first chapter of your journey, an entry into a world filled with darkness, horrors, and mysteries. Ahead lies more trials, new enemies, and new opportunities. Will you be able to reach the end of this story?

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes of violence, including depictions of blood and the death of the main character. There is strong language, as well as references to a fictional drug. The storyline includes disturbing and brutal scenes that may cause discomfort for some players.

name: God Syndrome

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 (64bit ver)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (Sandy Bridge) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics supporting OpenGL 2.0 or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 (64bit ver)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with OpenGL 2.0 support
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: An atmospheric psychological horror-roguelike with elements of visual novel and quest. Explore a dark world, solve puzzles, make tough decisions, and build relationships with characters. Every choice can determine whether you survive.
